title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. D, pt. 642 - Retention By Telephone And Telegraph Corporations Of Records At Principal Office
content:

State Regulations
§ 642.1 - Retention of records at principal office required
§ 642.2 - Notice of transfer
§ 642.3 - Applicability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. D, pt. 642

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
